entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
